::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus responded to Guardia.

Rodimus: Perseus wasn't left with much of a choice. This Predacon just wont have it any other way.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  "Alright, let's begin!" shouted Perseus, pulling out a pair of machetes and charging at Dinobot.

As he got closer, he raised his right weapon and struck downward as he leaped forward.

Meanwhile... 

Guardia followed Rodimus to the new location.

"... I must say I'm a bit disappointed." she said to Rodimus.  "I didn't expect that he'd actually give in to that Predacon's demands." 

On 5/20/07, Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
>          
>    
>

> Dinobot: Conditions? Not specifically, but I must advise you that 
>  melee combat is a speciality of mine.
>  
>  He flashed his claws for a second.
>  
>  Dinobot: I carry no explosives. Just those and a blaster. When you are
>  ready...
